snippet: President Obama’s remarks in the Rose Garden came as Democrats and Republicans differ on how to stop the rate for federally subsidized student loans from rising on July 1.
abstract: Pres Obama urges lawmakers to act quickly to stop student loan interest rates from doubling; his remarks at event in the Rose Garden come as Democrats and Republicans differ on how to stop rate for federally subsidized student loans from rising on July 1.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s remarks in the Rose Garden came as Democrats and Republicans differ on how to stop the rate for federally subsidized student loans from rising on July 1.

headline.seo: Obama Warns of Doubling of Student Loan Rates
headline.main: With Students as Backdrop, Obama Warns of Doubling of Loan Rates
headline.print_headline: Obama Urges Lawmakers to Lock Student Loan Rates Before They Double
